title: Market share of the global luggage market 2015 , by company
summary: The statistic shows a market share breakdown of the global smartwatch / consumer wearables market in 2014 . samsung 's share of the smartwatch market was 23 percent . The smartwatch market - additional information The wearable technology industry is a new and expanding market , with rapidly growing revenues and innovative new players entering the market .

data.Company: LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA

gold: The statistic shows the market share of the global luggage market in 2015 , by company . In that year , the global market share of Samsonite was approximately 17.3 percent .
